parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The front end wobble/steering instability can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, especially when decelerating or cornering.
symptoms: The front end of the motorcycle shakes or wobbles
the handlebars vibrate or hop back and forth
and the rider may experience a loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front End Wobble and Steering Bearing Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The front end wobble can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, especially at high speeds. The failure of the steering bearings can lead to tire failure, further increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The front end of the motorcycle wobbles or vibrates
especially when letting off the throttle or braking at speeds between 40-70 mph

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel valve diaphragm can cause fuel leaks, which can lead to fires, accidents, or other safety hazards.
symptoms: Fuel leaking from the fuel valve diaphragm.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inaccurate speedometer readings can lead to safety concerns, such as speeding or slow driving, which can cause accidents or other hazards.
symptoms: Speedometer readings are off by up to 10%.
